name: Effortless Habit Tracker
description: Introducing the Effortless Habit Tracker Notion Template: Transform Your Habits with Ease!ðŸ“‹ What do you get?Daily, weekly, and calendar view to easily track your habitsTrack up to 4 habits that can be changed at any point to suit your unique needs and goalsIncludes Nicola Tesla's 3-6-9 Theory for added inspiration and motivationToday's Journal to reflect on your progress and set intentions for the day ahead"What would make today great" section to help you stay focused on your goals and prioritie
features: Daily, weekly, and calendar view to easily track your habits; Track up to 4 habits that can be changed at any point to suit your unique needs and goals; Includes Nicola Tesla's 3-6-9 Theory for added inspiration and motivation; Today's Journal to reflect on your progress and set intentions for the day ahead; "What would make today great" section to help you stay focused on your goals and priorities; Highlight of the day list to celebrate your accomplishments and successes; Advice on how to create and break habits to help you establish positive routines and leave behind bad habits
